tool.name: CreateExternalRangeReviewFromEbirdAbundance
tool.displayname: Create External Range Review from eBird Abundance

param.name: ebird_full_year_raster
param.dialogReference: The Full Year Abundance raster downloaded from eBird

param.name: ebird_breeding_season_raster
param.dialogReference: The Breeding Season Abundance raster downloaded from eBird

param.name: label
param.dialogReference: eBird's short label for the species (e.g., SOLSAN for Solitary Sandpiper)

param.name: percent_of_population_cutoff
param.dialogReference: The percent of population that determines which raster cells will be excluded to avoid including vagrants, misidentifications and similar

tool.summary: Create an external range review table from eBird Abundance raster(s)

idCitation.resTitle: Create External Range Review from eBird Abundance
